text: (napiye!) Evarkal (etirikalal) tunpuruttappattu, pinnar (tankal illattiliruntu) velippattu, porum purintu (pala ciramankalaiyum) cakittuk kontu urutiyaka iruntarkalo avarkaluk(ku arul purivatar)kakave niccayamaka umatu iraivan irukkiran. Niccayamaka umatu iraivan itarkup pinnarum (avarkalai) mannippavan (avarkal mitu) karunaiyutaiyavan avan
